publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3195 Ms Margaret Curran on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees—(a) that consideration of the Environmental Levy on Plastic Bags (Scotland) Bill at Stage 1 be completed by 27 January 2006; and(b) that consideration of the Housing (Scotland) Bill at Stage 2 be completed by 4 November 2005.Supported by: George Lyon*
